speech:
Purple Gold

-Medium sized plant with purples flowers
-Tubers are round and have dark purple skin with white flesh eyes
-Has long tuber dormancy
-Has excellent crisping quality
-It is predominantly grown in Narok but can be grown in other areas
-Moderate resistance to late blight, PLRV but susceptible to PVY
-Tolerant to most soil borne diseases
-It is resistant to greening and has good storability
-Yields 10,000 â€“ 14,000kg per acre
-Uses: mashing, boiling, roasting and chip
